abstract: Novartis has become the first company to win approval for a copy of Johnson & Johnson’s Eprex anemia treatment, allowing it to offer cheaper versions to Europeans.
snippet: Novartis has become the first company to win approval for a copy of Johnson & Johnson’s Eprex anemia treatment, allowing it to offer cheaper versions to Europeans.
lead_paragraph: Novartis has become the first company to win approval for a copy of Johnson & Johnson’s Eprex anemia treatment, allowing it to offer cheaper versions to Europeans.
